sourcesContent:
Receive Order

Please select an item.
Please select a supplier.
Please enter the ordered date.
Please enter a valid quantity (minimum 1).
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-receive-order', templateUrl: './receive-order.component.html', styleUrls: ['./receive-order.component.css'] }) export class ReceiveOrderComponent { }
